lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure will miss Wednesday's Champions League quarter-final, first leg at Paris St Germain with a knee injury but keeper Joe Hart is fit, manager Manuel Pellegrini said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Man City Midfielder Toure Out of PSG Game, Hart Fit
headline.main: Man City Midfielder Toure Out of PSG Game, Hart Fit

snippet: Manchester City midfielder Yaya Toure will miss Wednesday's Champions League quarter-final, first leg at Paris St Germain with a knee injury but keeper Joe Hart is fit, manager Manuel Pellegrini said on Tuesday....
